title: Mass Shootings, A$AP is Free, Church Complaints, Summer Romance and more.
itunes:title: Mass Shootings, A$AP is Free, Church Complaints, Summer Romance and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Top of the week and today is dedicated to those that like flat wings.  Two more mass shootings.  Pray for El Paso and Dayton.  Tommy talks about his Kappa weekend and goes right to the Jackpot Joint of Jerusalem where he is joined by Deacon Junior.  A$AP Rocky is finally free.  We wish Barack Obama a belated Happy Birthday and the crew talk about their favorite moments of our POTUS.  Summer love is a beautiful thing, however, if you want to know the different ways to end a summer romance, then look no further.  Wendy Williams is unsure about continuing her TV show.  Today in Closing Remarks, The CEO speaks about faith and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
